scripts.tag: git tag v$env${npm_package_version} && git push origin v$env${npm_package_version} && git push
scripts.prod: npm run build-prod && git add . && git commit -am 'New release prod'
scripts.stage: npm run build-stage && git add . && git commit -am 'New release stage'
scripts.stage:tag: npm run stage && npm run tag
scripts.release:patch:stage: npm run version:patch && npm run stage:tag
scripts.release:minor:stage: npm run version:minor && npm run stage:tag
scripts.release:major:stage: npm run version:major && npm run stage:tag
scripts.release:prerelease:stage: npm run version:prerelease && npm run stage:tag
scripts.prod:tag: npm run prod && npm run tag
scripts.release:patch:prod: npm run version:patch && npm run prod:tag
scripts.release:minor:prod: npm run version:minor && npm run prod:tag
scripts.release:major:prod: npm run version:major && npm run prod:tag
scripts.release:prerelease:prod: npm run version:prerelease && npm run prod:tag
